typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		salesDate as string,
		salesName as string,
		country as string,
		quantity as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(isNull(toDate(salesDate,'dd-MMM-yyyy')),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(errorrows, goodrows)
ConditionalSplit1@errorrows derive(filename = 'Salesind_2020_MAY_01') ~> filenamecolumnforerrorrows
ConditionalSplit1@goodrows derive(filename = 'Salesind_2020_MAY_01',
		salesDate = toDate(salesDate, 'dd-MMM-yyyy'),
		quantity = toInteger(quantity)) ~> filenamecolumnforgoodrows
filenamecolumnforerrorrows sink(input(
		salesDate as string,
		salesName as string,
		country as string,
		quantity as string,
		filenames as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		salesDate,
		salesName,
		country,
		quantity,
		filenames = filename
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
filenamecolumnforgoodrows sink(input(
		salesDate as date,
		salesName as string,
		country as string,
		quantity as integer,
		filenames as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		salesDate,
		salesName,
		country,
		quantity,
		filenames = filename
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
